manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: San Francisco Soap Company Midnight Amber Man Bar Make your manly skin smell and look amazing with the Midnight Amber Man Bar from San Francisco Soap Company. The San Francisco Soap Company creates all their products with one goal in mind, to provide only high-quality products without using harmful fillers and chemicals that big label companies use. Our soap gently cleanses and leaves skin feeling smooth and nourished, rather than stripped and dry. We take pride in our unique formulation that blends only the finest ingredients. This bar is 10 oz. San Francisco Soap Company - USA Made We are a manufacturer of USA MADE personal care products. Our state-of-the-art facilities are located in southeastern Massachusetts. Our unique formulations are intended to keep your skin smooth and healthy. Our soaps are large, they are meant to last and not dissolve away to a bar of nothing like most soaps do! Be sure to check out our other listings for more fine quality long lasting soap for your skin and your hair! Be a Rockstar with Quality Ingredients Our products consist of unique formulas with no harmful ingredients. We are constantly developing new items and designs that we look forward to sharing with our customers, while adhering to the fine tradition of the exceptional locally made quality that embodies the San Francisco Soap Company. The Man Bar Product Line! The San Francisco Soap Company makes some amazing soaps in different formats that our customers love - all the way from hand soap in a pump bottle to bar soaps and soap on-a-rope! The soaps are large and long lasting. Check out the San Francisco Soap Company storefront to learn more about our product line.
You've tried the rest, now try the best!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My husband loves this soap!
reviews.reviewText: My husband loves this soap. The smell is amazing & it last throughout the bar! Its nice and big for my big man!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my dad for Father's Day. He said it smelt great and lasted forever. He used it every day for almost a whole year before he asked me to get him a new bar. It is definitely worth the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I hate when I run out of this soap for my husband…
reviews.reviewText: This has to be some of the best smelling soap we have ever purchased. My husband has dry skin….. can be sensitive at times. When he uses this soap, not only does he smell amazing but his skin feels so good. These soap smell manly and sexy!!! I love them!!! I use them often too ! I have bought all different scents from this company and have never been disappointed!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Surprisingly good, but not great
reviews.reviewText: I didn't have high hopes for this one, but I was pleasantly surprised.- The bar is larger, which is good because it doesn't have great longevity, but it certainly doesn't melt entirely after only a week or two like some of the competition. That was a surprising plus.- The scent was okay, nothing great in my opinion but I did get some compliments. I guess it just didn't feel like it had a unique scent to it and was a bit chemical-ly. But others liked it so... different strokes, I suppose. Also, the scent does stick to the body well and the fragrance is present throughout the bar, not just sprayed on the outside and that's it.- This being a moisturizing soap, I did feel my skin was getting a nice refresh. Not the best I've had, but certainly better than plenty of others. I don't have particularly dry skin, so those who do have that skin issue may have different opinions, but for me it was adequate.I guess there are 2 negatives, though neither has to do with the soap itself...- I do hate the name. "man bar". Wish the company would just do something like, "SF SoCo". Man bar just sounds really silly. I wouldn't get this as a gift for someone on that basis alone because it's that silly of a name to me. It's trying to market how some competitors do and it comes off tacky. "No, it's not a loaf of bread, this is for manly men, so we'll call it a man loaf!"...get it? Just unnecessary.- The packaging. While it's nice, don't get me wrong, (it has a magnetically closing box which is pretty cool...although made in china) it's really unnecessary. Let me put it this way... when you open a package of soap and use it, do you keep the packaging for any reason? I sure don't and I've never seen anyone else do that. I certainly don't put the soap back into the packaging after I've used it, yet that seems like the point of the box being so elaborate, and yet it's not... it's just for packaging. I don't get it. I only bring this up because I do feel if they simplified the packaging, they could reduce their price even more to be more competitive and the product wouldn't suffer at all.Overall- Not 'the best' soap I've used, but for the price, it's not too bad and was pleasantly surprising in a couple aspects.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lasts so long
reviews.reviewText: My fiancé loves this soap bar. It smells really great and last super long time. it’s a lot of money for soap but since it last so long and he loves it so much I think it’s worth it. I get him for Christmas every year

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value for the money!Excellent Manly Gift! Smells Great!
reviews.reviewText: Highly recommend!! Great value for the money and Incredibly Fast delivery!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I found this soap in a little shop when we were on vacation. My husband does not like scented soaps. Well, he loves this soap. He loves the lather, it doesn’t dry out his skin, and he loves the scent! It's a keeper.
